replies.body:
_Sigh_ I really am not having fun doing this for quite a while now. Not just writing stories, but playing League itself. So it is with a bit of a heavy heart to say that I will be taking a break from League. I might be back during Pre-season, but until then this will probably be my last story I write for quite a while. Again sorry to say this, but I don't want to burn myself out. 

So here the last piece of this Urgot story: 

{{champion:16}} If only there was a way to show you how much your life impacted others. 

{{champion:53}} **I can accomplish that with my 'what if?' machine right here.**

{{champion:6}} 'what if?' machine? 

{{champion:53}} **Affirmative. This machine will show us possible outcomes to question. **

{{champion:16}} Ooo. Let try it. What if Urgot wasn't around anymore? 

_Images:_

**PEACE AT LAST!**

{{champion:59}} Glad that pesky war is behind us Swain. 

{{champion:50}} Same here. Going to Katarina and Garen wedding? 

{{champion:59}} Who isn't? I got an extra seat if you need a lift. 

{{champion:50}} Thanks. 

**Hate and Sadness at a all-time low.**

{{champion:32}} Who wants to go to the beach!? 

{{champion:1}} I do 

{{champion:45}} Same

{{champion:67}} Beach sounds fun. 

{{champion:63}} I haven't been to the beach in forever. Great idea. 

{{champion:127}} Indeed. Let go. 

{{champion:32}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:67}} _Cheering_

**Magic for all!**

{{champion:101}} At last my dream is realized. Everyone is free. 

{{champion:497}} So what do we do now babe? 

{{champion:498}} What do you say we find a cozy place to live and create some 'magic' of our own? 

{{champion:497}} Oh baby....

_end images_ 

{{champion:6}} ...........................................

{{champion:16}} Well..umm...that was...interesting. 

{{champion:6}} The Hell kind of world is that!? I understand my purpose now. I live so that the world doesn't become like...that. I need to work harder, improve myself. I need to upgrade. _leaves._

{{champion:16}} Umm...what is going to happen now? 

{{champion:53}} **Let see. 'what if?" machine. What if Urgot does upgrade himself.**

_beep_
http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/LOL_CMS_98_Article_04.jpg


{{champion:53}} **Interesting.**

Sorry to hear that.
GL out there, and thanks for ~~all the fish~~ entertaining us for as long as you have.
Are there specific things about the current state of League that leaves you unsatisfied?

Many things. 

Plants. 

No smite bonus.  (I really miss the Wolf and rapotor smite bonus.) 

Just..the current Jungle meta in general. 

The change to vision wards 

Malzahar (my main champ) being sent to support for a long time and even though he back mid, he still not as fun for me as before. 

Item nerf/changes

The lifesteal keystone being changed (I liked that one a lot.) 

ARAM Maokai....holy crap I hate that guy.

You're a legend and I'm sad to hear that you're leaving. It's your decision though and we can't stop you.

You've contributed so much to the Boards and the Sales pages during your time, and you will be sorely missed.
Maybe someone else will carry on the legend.
I will try my best to reach your expectations senpai-kun.
